website_summaries.verdict: The Court Borough Mid by Nike is a shoe that flawlessly combines retro design with an upgraded level of comfort to match today’s footwear standards.It features a classic basketball silhouette but specially crafted for everyday use. This shoe’s sleek athletic appeal is recommended for people who not only value comfort but are also looking for an old school designed pair.
pros: The majority of reviewers find the Nike Court Borough Mid very comfortable for a long period of use
Most of the shoe purchasers are attracted to the pair because of its stylish appeal
The Nike Court Borough Mid has a versatile design that can match most casual outfits, according to a handful of users
This model of Nike Court sneakers is available in different colorways
A number of buyers have mentioned that the shoe’s good attributes make it a good value for money
Some long-time fans like the shoe’s retro-inspired look
A few wearers are happy they get compliments when they wear the pair out
It is lightweight, according to a few commenters
The Nike Court Borough Mid-top silhouette offers great ankle support based on some reviewers
cons: Some shoe users have noticed that its toebox tends to crease after a couple of wears
The sole wears off quickly, as a couple of reviewers have complained

customer_reviews.title: Great xmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch on 2008 for my hubby for xmas gift and he loves it, he wears it all the time to the gym, Volleyball game or any sport event and he had only changed the battery, the strap still in perfect condition. Great price and great look:)
customer_reviews.author: Happy SAHM of twin girls

customer_reviews.title: I will never buy a used product again!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when reading the profile for this item...just like new!! When I received it, it was everything that was expected except that water got into the watch 2 months afterwards and it stopped working which led me to believe that probably it was opened up some time before!! This buy was truly disappointing. I will never buy a product that is not new again!! I contacted the seller who first told me to change the battery and then advised to send it back but when I informed them that I was out of the country and could only return it when I got back I received no more feedback from the seller!!!
customer_reviews.author: Svanie

customer_reviews.title: High quality.
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Good product and price. Color same as shown online in pics Fits well. Not too bulky for small wrists.
customer_reviews.author: NBT

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch was purchased over a year ago and still works great. The only negative thing is that the screen will scratch easily. Otherwise very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi D

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch, looks very nice for a sports watch. I love the analog hands give it a bit of style. Only a simple stop watch but works great. A little bulky for my small wrists but i still like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite watch
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and I love the alternative design. I get comments on it all the time. The only downside is that sometimes if you hyperflex you hand, it can hit the mode button. No big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Techy looking ( nice design )
customer_reviews.text: This watch at 1st seemed ideal for instant reading. It draws interest from others. Problems occur if you wear long sleeves or if you are outdoors in direct sun. It becomes hard to read. Although it is cool and high tech looking, it is uncomfortable and I can not get accustomed to wearing it. The 1st time I had the battery replaced, I lost the illumination feature. I believe it is more suited to a younger person.
customer_reviews.author: David N. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Six years later and I still can't replace this watch ...
customer_reviews.text: Six years later and I still can't replace this watch. I've hit so hard on every wall (accidentally). It cannot be scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Tarek Najdi

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice sport watch, and for the price you can't get better than that. I use for soccer games and to keep my time running. And i also get a lot of compliments for the design.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel C. Pinheiro

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've purchased this watch for my husband who seems to lose them a lot on the golf course. But I love it! And highly recommend it. UPDATE: This watch and many other Nike watches I have purchased since then have broken quickly. I will never buy another Nike watch. We are 0/4 with them lasting more than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Emily James

customer_reviews.title: Best sneakers
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect sneaker my child is extremely happy with the Nike ...glad to see such a huge smile
customer_reviews.author: Evey

customer_reviews.title: Nice and pretty.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you see. It's a Nike product, you know what I mean. Great watch.
customer_reviews.author: Serpens Solida

customer_reviews.title: Dream Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are SO sleek looking. As a dancer and these are go-to shoes for practice. They are comfy, fit well but look relaxed.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch in aqua blue a year ago. I purchased it for a cruise, and planned on using it for activities and sports after the cruise was complete. The watch looks nice, but I must question the quality. One of the side buttons popped out after just two weeks of use! Luckily it popped back in and it hasn't happened again. Also, the strap was dark black when I got it. But after a few hours in saltwater, the black became very faded. It's not a bad watch, but I would look at other options.
customer_reviews.author: Go Blue 99

customer_reviews.title: ok watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch on vacation at a marshalls for 25 bucks last summer. i thought to myself, cant go wrong for a Nike watch at that price. I like the way it looks and feels on my wrist, and the numbers are easily readable. I wore the watch occasionally then the light stopped working. That is a big pet peeve of mine. After a year with only occasional use, the light died. Im glad i didnt wear it too much or I really would have been disappointed. The band also started to unglue around the face of the watch about 1 week after I bought it. I will never stray from g shocks again.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar G. Overstreet IV

customer_reviews.title: Nike Watch - a waste of $80 dollars
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this Nike watch for 7 months. It is a very neat watch. Unfortunately it broke and I don't know how. One evening I remove it from my wrist and notice the black bubber wrist band had separated from the body at the rear battery cover. The entire rubber/plastic hinge had cracked. This wrist band is not replaceable. I wore this watch daily to my office job. A sports watch should be made rugged. This one is not. Lesson learned is to buy a watch which has a standard replacable wrist band.
customer_reviews.author: justaregularguy

customer_reviews.title: Nike Blade Watch WC0037
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this Nike Blade watch model WC0037 for 7 months. Out of all the watches I own this one was my most favorite. Oh NO, IT BROKE !!! One evening while removing it from my wrist I notice the black bubber wrist band had separated from the body at the rear battery cover. The entire rubber/plastic hinge had cracked. This wrist band is not replaceable. I wore this watch daily to my office job. It is a mistery of how and why it broke. Lesson learned is to stick with watches which have standard replacable wrist bands.
customer_reviews.author: HandyMan

customer_reviews.title: Best Athletic Watch I have owned
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Nike Sledge with the intent of using it soley for working out. I'm athletic, teach group-exercise classes...and liked the large number display for fast glimpses at my watch while I'm teaching. I'm a woman, didn't want something to be too "clunky"--and let me say...I LOVE THIS WATCH! I wear it regularly now with my day-clothes! Everytime it's on my wrist I receive compliments from both men & women. For the low price, it's worth taking a chance on something you may not have chosen before. Easy to use & reliable!
customer_reviews.author: Denise M. Egan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, Uber cool style statement
customer_reviews.text: Nike Mettle Sledge is the uber cool style statement in watches. Best for daily use, casual use, party wear. Its a really well designed watch, enhancing your looks.
customer_reviews.author: Vibhoo

product_meta.title: Nike Unisex Adults’ Court Borough Mid Basketball Shoes
product_meta.description: Men's court borough Mid shoes that offer a structured support with a look inspired by classic basketball. Synthetic leather and suede that increase comfort and durability. The shoe is characterized by a medium-high silhouette for greater ankle support. The original rubber sole is perfect for comfort and flexibility throughout the day.
